job_desc:
Want to do cool shit with amazing data to make an impact in a tech lagging industry? Would you like to join a fast-growing B2B SaaS company that is revolutionizing the manufacturing industry by empowering factory workers whilst saving paper at the same time? Fresh from announcing a further €5 million of funding in March, we are now searching for our first-ever Data Analyst! Working with our Founders, CTO, the Product Circle, Customer Success, well, basically, the whole company, you will take ownership of data analytics at SwipeGuide. Your mission? Empower SwipeGuide with data-driven insights on the product, business, and customer to scale adoption and usage and help us make the right decisions. You'll manage the overall data architecture and develop, prioritize and recommend initiatives to improve and build upon the data architecture to support SwipeGuide.
WHO ARE WE?
We are SwipeGuide. We are on a mission to reduce waste, spare resources for better use, and save the world from useless paper instructions. Imagine working on a busy production line, and you have to rely upon outdated, inadequate work instructions. PDF and paper instructions are a thing of the past, so we're developing simple, intuitive cloud software to empower factory teams to perform better in their jobs and scale knowledge with digital standard work. Our SwipeGuide platform enables global companies like Coca-Cola, Heineken, and PepsiCo to build and share visual step-by-step digital work instructions with their workforce on any device. And yes, it also feels good to enable them to use less paper and save the trees!
We all know that a digital future is unavoidable, and we're providing the software essential for digital transformation. And it's working. We started with five people in 2016; today, after €5mn funding in March 2021, we have twenty-five full-time employees, 100,000+ platform users in 89 countries worldwide, and an inclusive, continuously improving culture.
OUR TEAM OF SWIPEES
We have recently become a part-remote organization, but our office is preserved for 10 Swipees to attend each day (totally optional). For the future, it's totally up to you: hammock on the beach or face-to-face smiles?
We work in a bustling startup hub B.2 in Amsterdam with 300+ other startups. You'll see the usual ping pong table, foosball, arcade machines, and PS4s everywhere. But, there are also charming places to sit in the sun, break-out areas, and ambitious, inspired people as far as the eye can see (when everyone returns!);
You'll soon meet the road cyclist, the yoga lover, the guy with an oyster business, the ex-chef, the person to count on in an emergency, the social butterfly, the DJ trainee, the volleyball player, and someone who owns hundreds of sneakers;
We like to fail (it's how we learn), and in our PowWow, we share our f*** ups (failures) and learn together;
Our values are at the heart of everything we do; we strive to enable Swipees to develop their potential and showcase their authentic selves and engage in a culture of inclusion
YOUR ROLE AS THE DATA ANALYST AT SWIPEGUIDE
Currently, we gather a lot of valuable content data, such as the number of guides created, published, viewed and more! We have built our own event tracking service with AWS Lambda and store our own analytics data in AWS Redshift and AWS RDS. From these data sources, ETL scripts, and an aggregation pipeline, we build and embed dashboards for customers with Sisense, a third party dashboarding tool.
As the first-ever Data Analyst at SwipeGuide, you will work closely with Sue (CTO), Daan (Founder/CPO), Willemijn (Founder/CEO), and a small team of Data Engineers to build, maintain, and troubleshoot data reports used by the company and our customers.
This can mean everything from creating new charts based on the data architecture and tooling we currently have to transform our data strategy completely. You have the freedom and power to OWN IT!
The challenge:
Self Service: We are storing immense amounts of data but all of those insights are trapped inside of our tables in several databases. How can we make it easy to access and visualize that data? Can we enable non-developers to get those insights themselves?
Maintenance: With ever-changing requirements from customers about the business about what they want to know (and ever-changing features in the platform) we need to keep up and make sure the data and reports are up to date and accurate.
Performance: Sisense offers customers the ability to filter views of graphs and tables based on date, and we need to keep the historical data to show adoption over time. How can we optimize our queries and data structures to do this in the most performant way possible?
Cross-platform experience: How can we combine and organize data from users on the web-based CMS and Viewers, but also our NativeApps?

Your responsibilities:
Given the size of our team and demands from our customers, you’ll be working on both operational and strategic levels. That means, on the one hand, you should be comfortable with data analysis, creating charts, and SQL scripts yourself, and on the other hand, you will use your broad experience and expertise to advise on what data to collect and store, how to do model and maintain it, and what tools we should use and implement.
A day in the life of the Data Analyst could look like this:
Defining the strategy for Data Architecture at SwipeGuide
Create initiatives and develop priorities to improve upon our Data Architecture
Defining and implementing new event tracking
Developing reports and analysis to support SwipeGuide with decision making
Analyzing existing tools and databases and providing software solution recommendations
Providing technical expertise in data storage structures, data mining, and data cleansing
Design and develop large and complex data warehouse architectures
Take ownership of large production data systems to support a variety of growing data needs
Design, implement and expand data pipelines by performing preprocessing, cleaning and monitoring activities
Growing the future Data Circle with the support you need to scale
ESSENTIAL ATTRIBUTES FOR THE DATA ANALYST
At least 5 years of experience as a data analyst, business analyst, BI analyst, or related role.
Experience with Data strategy for a young tech SaaS company
Expert in writing and debugging SQL queries
Experience in handling large data sets with relational databases (ex: AWS RDS) and non-relational databases (ex: AWS Redshift)
Demonstrated experience working with power BI tools such as Looker, Tableau, Sisense, or similar (can you walk us through a chart you created?)
You know what a "materialized view" and "ETL script" is
Able to translate complex requirements into non-technical, lay terms.
Able to work independently and make decisions and manage priorities in a fast-paced startup environment;
Organized and structured way-of-working;
Fast learner with a growth mindset
Fluent in English
NICE TO HAVES TO BE SWIPEGUIDES DATA ANALYST:
Experience working with Node.js or Python
Basic JavaScript and bash scripting experience (for updating data scripts in our web application)
Experience working with AWS and its additional data related services (ex: Snowflake, Glue, etc. - we have a ton of free credits to experiment with until March 2022!)
Interest in machine learning, AI, etc.
WHAT'S IN IT FOR YOU?
Unlimited holidays (and we think it works here!);
In-office smiles or Zoom meets, up to you. Full-Remote working opportunities + Amsterdam office ;
Competitive monthly compensation + monthly holiday pay;
A challenging environment to develop your personal and professional skills with a lot of freedom to take on ownership;
You'll be in a fortunate situation to make a high impact at a startup that is about to lift off after €5mn funding;
You will enjoy working in a startup hub at B. Amsterdam;
A chance to learn from other people's mistakes - we share and celebrate failures each week
WHAT ARE YOUR FUTURE COLLEAGUES SAYING ABOUT SWIPEGUIDE?
"I love the atmosphere of collaboration. It really feels like everyone here cares about our product and genuinely wants it to grow and succeed. That's a healthy kind of place to work." - Chris Content Marketer."SwipeGuide gives me hands-on experience in how to build a company from scratch alongside really passionate people. The gap between who I am and who I wanna be as a professional gets smaller every day here, and that's what defines a good workplace for me". - Ingrid (Customer Success Specialist)
SwipeGuide is committed to creating a diverse environment influenced by a lifetime of individual experiences. We hire people from all walks of life, not just because it's the right thing to do, but also because when people from diverse backgrounds build a company, the understanding and embracing of their communities grow exponentially. This means our creative and strategic horizons are not only expanding, but they're consistently strengthening, thanks to a global perspective. Therefore, we make a constant effort to follow the right practices and processes so that we do not discriminate based on education, race, religion, colour, national origin, genetics, gender, gender identity, sexual orientation, age, marital status, veteran status, or disability status.
Could you see yourself in a similar position, but not this one? We are open to changing this position to suit your skillset. Apply then email ben@swipeguide.com - (we are open to new ideas for this position).

Wat je doet?
Data kan enorm waardevol zijn bij het maken van betere besluiten. Als het goed wordt ingezet!
Als Data Analytics consultant speel jij een grote rol om onze klanten hiermee te helpen.
Als Data Analytics consultant heb je de kans om bij diverse organisaties in verschillende rollen te werken. Zo adviseer je de ene klant over de beste implementatie van analytics: Je onderzoekt wat de klant wil, nodig heeft en wat (technisch) mogelijk is. Je maakt bijvoorbeeld use cases met de klant, onderzoekt de data kwaliteit met een technische collega of laat diverse visualisatietools zien. Bij een volgende opdracht implementeer je een visualisatietools, bouw je dashboards en train je medewerkers van klanten rondom allerlei nieuwe datavaardigheden.
In elke opdracht die je doet ben jij de brug tussen business en techniek. Sterke communicatieve vaardigheden, passie voor het datavakgebied en een gezonde dosis nieuwsgierigheid zijn hierbij onmisbaar. Als je start als Data Analytics consultant, hoef je wat ons betreft nog niet alles te weten. Vanuit de basis die jij meebrengt, leiden we je ‘on the job’ verder op.
Hoe ziet jouw uitdaging eruit?
Axians is een internationale netwerkorganisatie bestaande uit gespecialiseerde en zelfsturende IT units. De Axians locatie in Laren (NH) is gespecialiseerd in Business Analytics. Met zo’n 80 collega’s werken we samen om onze klanten te helpen en adviseren met hun datavraagstukken. Wij werken samen met grote, innovatieve organisaties als Landal, LeasePlan, Transavia, RTL Nederland en De Persgroep. Onze werkwijze is gebaseerd op onze Axians kernwaarden: empowerment, verantwoordelijkheid, ondernemen, vertrouwen & transparantie en solidariteit.
Als Data Analytics consultant ben je onderdeel van het Smart Analytics team. Binnen dit team krijg je alle ruimte om eigen initiatieven te ontplooien, verder uit te werken en in de markt te zetten. We vinden het belangrijk dat jij goed in je vel zit. Zoals Teammanager Ninette Klooster zegt: “Dan komt er een goed gevoel los. De klanten gaan het merken, de projecten gaan vallen en dan komt de omzet automatisch.” Lees hier meer over Axians Business Analytics in Laren, het Smart Analytics team en over onze visie en werkwijze.
Wat vragen wij van jou?
Relevante bachelor of master opleiding
Passie voor data analytics
Communicatief sterk, nieuwsgierig en gericht op samenwerking
Hands-on ervaring met visualisatietool zoals Microsoft PowerBI of Tableau
Affiniteit of ervaring met projectmanagement en Agile werken is een pré
Maar het belangrijkste is, dat je graag met data en mensen werkt. En als je dan niet alle punten hierboven aan kan vinken, geen punt.. We gaan graag met je in gesprek om te kijken hoe we elkaar kunnen versterken.
Wij staan open voor kandidaten met zowel junior als medior ervaring op het gebied van data analytics, visualisaties en business intelligence.
Wat bieden wij jou?
Naast een inhoudelijke uitdaging, gave opdrachten en collega’s die net zo gek op data zijn als jij, staat werkgeluk bij ons centraal. Als jij lekker in je vel zit, komen jouw kwaliteiten op je werk ook het beste tot zijn recht. Wij creëren een professionele werksfeer waar jij jezelf kan en mag zijn. Onze consultants beschrijven de cultuur in Laren als open, met een familiegevoel en professioneel. Naast het werk organiseren we bijvoorbeeld regelmatig leuke activiteiten om samen met je collega’s te doen. Bekijk dit filmpje om de sfeer in te proeven in Laren.
Natuurlijk ben je nooit uitgeleerd! Op onze Academy volg je regelmatig, tijdens werktijd, trainingen om je kennis én vaardigheden verder te ontwikkelen.
Wat als ik deze baan graag wil?
Leuk! We leren je graag kennen. Laat jouw gegevens en bericht achter via de ‘solliciteer direct’ button. Of neem contact op met onze recruiter Maxime Wesel via Maxime.Wesel@axians.com of 06-19630634. (WhatsApp is ook een optie!)
Schroom niet om ook contact op te nemen als je (nog) niet helemaal in het profiel past. Wij worden graag verrast door jouw motivatie en unieke kwaliteiten en kijken samen met jou naar de mogelijkheden!

Master Data Beheerder in Ede (40 uur)
Ben je analytisch sterk onderlegd en wil je onderdeel uit maken van een innovatief team bij een groeiende en ambitieuze marktleider binnen de Automotive branche? Dan is de vacature van Master Data Beheerder echt iets voor jou!
Wat bieden wij?
Een afwisselende baan bij een groeiend, internationaal bedrijf met een sterke marktpositie;
Je wordt onderdeel van een hecht team, waar je volop ruimte krijgt om mee te denken en jezelf te ontwikkelen;
Een rol spelen in het (inter)nationaal overbrengen van kennis en kunde.
Specificaties
Ede
40 uur
HBO werk- en denkniveau
Vast
Functieomschrijving
Je komt te werken op de afdeling Master Data Management (MDM). Deze afdeling is binnen Alliance Automotive Group Benelux verantwoordelijk voor de docking, verwerking, verrijking, interpretatie en het beheer van de product(master)data. Ook onderhoudt deze afdeling de data voor de diverse online toepassingen. Sinds enige tijd hebben zij hiervoor een State of the art PIM systeem in gebruik genomen, waarmee ze in staat zijn zowel de data als de processen te stroomlijnen en zo de diverse kanalen juist te voeden. Denk hierbij aan portals, webshops en leadgeneratoren.
Als Master Data Beheerder zorg jij ervoor dat de (master)data altijd up-to-date is en voldoet aan de verwachting. Je werkt nauw samen met de afdelingen Product Management en E-commerce. Je komt terecht in een enthousiast en betrokken team van 5 collega's en je rapporteert direct aan de Master Data Teamleider.
Naast het MDM Benelux team zit ook het team dat verantwoordelijk is voor de Europese datastrategie gevestigd in Ede. Vanzelfsprekend wordt er tussen deze afdelingen nauw samengewerkt. Voor uitdagende dataprojecten zit je in deze functie dus ‘front row’.
De voornaamste werkzaamheden zijn:
Het invoeren, onderhouden, controleren en synchroniseren van master data omtrent artikelgegevens in het PIM en SAP-systeem;
Het zorgdragen voor correcte brongegevens volgens de laatste actualiteit;
Deelnemen aan diverse vernieuwende projecten omtrent technische ontwikkelingen en master data;
Onderhouden van het Product Information Management (PIM) systeem.
Solliciteer nu!
Heeft onze vacature voor Master Data Beheerder je enthousiast gemaakt en voldoe je aan het profiel? . Vergeet niet jouw cv en sollicitatiebrief toe te voegen als bijlage!
Over Alliance Automotive Group Benelux
Alliance Automotive Group Benelux, onderdeel van het beursgenoteerde (NYSE) Genuine Parts Company, is een leidende distributeur van auto-onderdelen aan de onafhankelijke aftermarket in Frankrijk, Duitsland, Verenigd Koninkrijk, Portugal, Spanje en Polen.
Wie kan tegenwoordig zijn auto dagen missen? Bijna niemand toch? Als jouw auto voor onderhoud of reparatie naar de garage moet wil je dat deze zo snel mogelijk en zonder verrassingen weer voor je klaarstaat. Daarom maakt Alliance Automotive Group Benelux er een sport van om de garagehouder te voorzien van alles wat hiervoor nodig is; van voertuigdata tot de beste prijzen en van technische ondersteuning tot een razendsnelle levering van onderdelen! Het hoofdkantoor en tevens recent nieuw gebouwde, innovatieve Distributie Centrum (21.000 M2 vloer oppervlak) van Alliance Automotive Group Benelux zit in Ede.
Meer weten? Bekijk de website van Alliance Automotive Group Benelux en volg ons op social media!
Acquisitie naar aanleiding van deze advertentie wordt niet op prijs gesteld.

Wie zijn wij?
Al meer dan 50 jaar richt Intergas, sinds 2019 onderdeel van het Amerikaanse bedrijf Rheem, zich op het perfectioneren van verwarmingssystemen. In die periode is Intergas uitgegroeid tot marktleider op het gebied van hoog rendement cv-ketels. Die status verplicht ons om ook in de toekomst oplossingen te bedenken en te ontwikkelen die voldoen aan de vraag naar comfortabele warmte. Met slimme en innovatieve producten, maar ook met duurzame energiebronnen en hightech warmte-oplossingen die beantwoorden aan de energietransitie. Daarbij geloven we in een toekomst waarin ruimte is voor meerdere warmte-oplossingen naast elkaar. Geavanceerde oplossingen als all-electric en hybridetoestellen, maar ook de ‘conventionele’ gasgestookte cv-ketel. Zo zijn we voortdurend bezig om onze grenzen te verkennen en te verleggen. Het uitgangspunt is steeds hetzelfde: het ontwikkelen en produceren van betrouwbare warmtebronnen met een hoog rendement. De vestiging in Coevorden telt ruim 350 medewerkers.

Wat ga jij doen?
Als Master Data Specialist analyseer je data van onze bedrijfsprocessen en systemen. Je bent verantwoordelijk voor de kwaliteit van data en data-integratie binnen de systemen bij Intergas. Je hebt veel contact met collega’s over de inrichting van systemen en adviseert interne stakeholders over datakwaliteitsverbeteringen.

Jouw werkzaamheden zullen onder andere bestaan uit:Het vormgeven aan governance rondom het gebruik van data, analyses en rapportage;Je ontwerpt en implementeert corporate datamodellen en business intelligence;Het zorgdragen voor een juist verloop van data-entry(processen);Het ontwerpen, bouwen, testen en beheren van het datawarehouse;Je stelt gebruikers in staat om de gewenste en benodigde data-analyses te produceren door middel van het datawarehouse;Het inspelen, participeren en oplossingsgericht beantwoorden van vragen die uit de business komen;Draagt bij aan overige werkzaamheden binnen het team.

Als Master Data Specialist ben jij onderdeel van de afdeling ICT, die bestaat uit een IT-generalist, twee applicatiebeheerders en een Manager ICT. Je rapporteert aan de Manager ICT.

Wat breng jij mee?
Jij neemt een gezonde dosis enthousiasme en proactiviteit mee en bent een echte teamplayer! Het werken met data en het continu verbeteren van processen geeft jou energie.

Daarnaast zijn de volgende aspecten belangrijk voor ons:Een afgeronde Bacheloropleiding, bij voorkeur in de richting van bedrijfskunde en/of informatica;Beheersing van de Nederlandse en Engelse taal in woord en geschrift;Je bent in staat om effectief te presenteren en om te communiceren met de verschillende stakeholders;Je begrijpt de uitdagingen in een productie en sales omgeving;Bij voorkeur heb je al enkele jaren relevante werkervaring.

Wat krijg je ervoor terug?
Een uitdagende en afwisselende functie binnen een gezonde organisatie met ambitie. De werksfeer is informeel en je krijgt voldoende kansen om jezelf verder te ontwikkelen. Je werktijden zijn flexibel en je hebt de mogelijkheid om thuis te werken. Met 27 vakantiedagen en 13 ATV dagen (op fulltime basis) is er voldoende ruimte om te genieten van je vrije tijd!

Herken jij jezelf in bovenstaand profiel?
Wacht dan niet langer en stuur jouw curriculum vitae en motivatiebrief onder vermelding van ‘’sollicitatie Master Data Specialist naar jobs@intergas.nl of vul onderstaand formulier in.

skills: ai, azure, https, sql, deep, nosql, mysql, postgresql, paas, network
job_desc:
The Data and AI team acts as trusted advisors and subject matter experts with core capability and expertise in Data Modernization, Analytics and AI. We work with customers to leverage data to help them achieve their business priorities and help guide customer’s journey through Analytics-led Azure Data transformation. We also support customers in evaluating their applications and business requirements, recommend solutions that meet their requirements, and demonstrate these solutions to win the technical decision.
Microsoft is on a mission to empower every person and every organization on the planet to achieve more. Our culture is centered on embracing a growth mindset, a theme of inspiring excellence, and encouraging teams and leaders to bring their best each day. In doing so, we create life-changing innovations that impact billions of lives around the world. You can help us to achieve our mission.
Microsoft envisions a world where passionate innovators come to collaborate, envisioning what can be and taking their careers places they simply couldn’t anywhere else. This is a world of more possibilities, more innovation, more openness, and sky’s-the-limit thinking – a cloud-enabled world.
To learn more about Microsoft’s mission, please visit: https://careers.microsoft.com/mission-culture

Check out all our products at: http://www.microsoft.com/en-us
Responsibilities
We are looking for a seasoned Solutions Specialist to join our Global Black Belt (GBB) team to help us accelerate market adoption of Azure Data offerings with a focus on modernizing to Operational Databases (Azure SQL / OSS DB) and ARC enabled Data Services on Azure as well as winning new applications on Azure Data Platform with strategic customer projects. As a Specialist on the Global Black Belt team, you will be joining a team of highly skilled experts across the company who are driving the most strategic and innovative customer projects. This role is a senior sales lead within our enterprise sales organization focused on driving customer digital transformation scenarios. Microsoft Global Black Belt (GBB) Data & AI Specialist’s main goal is to win the technical decision within strategic customers and lead these engagements.

The successful candidate will accelerate and scale Microsoft’s share of customers' data estates (leveraging SQL and Azure ARC enabled Data services) with Azure Data & AI solutions driving cloud consumption. You will partner closely with our mainstream solution sellers, and key partner stakeholders to accelerate data modernization engagements with our customers leveraging value-based assessment/business case assessment.
Being part of the Global Black Belt team, you will maintain and develop deep professional, sales and industry thought leadership. You will have opportunities to showcase your expertise at various Microsoft and Industry conferences and work directly with our product engineering teams to influence the evolution of our Data technologies.

As a member of the Global Black Belt team, you will be responsible for:
Win new engagements via technical sales expertise proving technical and business value via workshops (1:1, 1:many) that drive commitment for minimum viable product (MVP) for business and technical decision makers showcasing Data modernization capabilities leveraging Azure Hybrid and Data modernization solutions.
Accelerate Azure consumption in targeted accounts landing Data modernization & Hybrid Data platform engagements by demonstrating technical depth with solution selling expertise, including best practices for industry application, solution value and specialized co-sell solutions that accelerate time to market and customer’s digital transformation.
Enable solution selling expertise across mainstream sellers by being the coach and model seller, scaling technical solution selling approach, engaging partners and engineering where needed, and championing the voice of customer, partner and field to global stakeholders.
Qualifications
The successful candidate will demonstrate the following skills and professional experiences.
Solution Skills
Understanding of data modernization technologies within organizations and functional stakeholders (ex: LOB managers, Application owners, IT admins, Database administrators, Developers, and associated interaction patterns)
Knowledge of designing or managing a large SQL Server implementation
Deep knowledge and experience on solutions architecture of cloud-based data platform workloads preferably across OLTP and Analytics workloads with Relational database solutions, and especially with SQL required.
Knowledge of common hybrid data scenarios and experience architecting these solutions
SQL Server or other Relational Database or NoSQL database knowledge.
Knowledge of SQL Licensing and SQL Azure Hybrid Benefits and Microsoft modernization programs (including Solution Assessments & TCO analysis)
Knowledge about competitor programs and differentiators
Understanding of microservices and application modernization techniques including cloud native design
Understanding of highly available data center operations including Hybrid Data platform capabilities
Familiarity with Azure Arc-enabled SQL offerings, Azure Arc-enabled data services
Experience in Data Platform solutions, engaging with enterprise customers in sales or technical architect roles
Experience with database analysis and design.
Good understanding of change control and data validation techniques.
Be an Azure Platform evangelist for SQL and Open-Source database scenarios such as modernizing Database VM clusters of SQL, MySQL or PostgreSQL to modern PaaS architectures, creating new resilient data architectures to accompany container services.
Common understanding of industry or functional scenarios
Sales Skills
Experienced Seller: Disciplined in business-management, meeting sales targets and operational standards. Mentors' other sellers by prompting them to engage the customer early with new insights. Demonstrated experience influencing senior stakeholders within customer and own organization.
Solution Expert: Deep understanding of unique solution area value, key areas of differentiation, and knowledge to create industry-centric use cases for the solution area.
Business Value Seller: Proven record of effective account management, particularly demonstrating: coupling business acumen with technology knowledge, to connect customer business challenges to their technology decisions and; coaching the customer through business case creation, approval, stakeholder buy-in and delivering results for large scale, cross-functional engagements, preferably on Data modernization to Cloud & Digital Transformation scenarios
Audience Credibility: Has credibility with key decision makers within our customers. Ability to influence target decision makers such as Business Decision Makers, Operational Technology Leaders, Database Administrators etc.
Social Seller: Builds a strong and active business network that stretches and influences far beyond themselves, including leveraging social selling tools such as LinkedIn Sales Navigator.
Excellent Communicator and Collaborator: Strong relationship building, negotiation, organizational, presentation, written, and verbal communication skills. Ability to effectively collaborate across teams and drive meaningful outcomes with corporate, field, partner and customer stakeholders.
Purposeful Planner and Orchestrator: Builds a purposeful sales plan with a bold ambition to identify and capitalize on transformational shifts in the market and leads plan orchestration and execution across a v-team through influence.
Technical Acumen: Experienced at driving solutions to full production roll out and solving technical challenges encountered through the project implementation. Strong synthesizer of tools, services and resources with own expertise to build complete end to end solutions.
Skill Enablement: A passion for and demonstrated capability of scaling own knowledge with others and building organizational capability in a targeted solution area.
The successful candidate will demonstrate the following skills and professional experiences.
Professional Experience
Required Experience: 5+ years of Data estate modernization and Hybrid Data solutions selling experience in enterprise public cloud-based solutions. Experience and understanding of large-scale data deployments in enterprise-wide environments

Recommended Sales Experience: 10+ years experience selling & deployment business solutions to large/global enterprise customers.

Knowledge of Data Base Platform:
Strong understanding of Database modernization solutions leveraging Cloud Platforms and Hybrid Data platform (including security) and the role Database platform plays in unlocking Cloud Platform value.
Strong understanding of Microsoft SQL Server T-SQL.
Strong understanding of ETL methodology and related data conversion/migration techniques.
Preferred Consultative Technical Selling. Validated experience in consultative technical selling approach, including bringing innovative ideas to customer problems and being customer focused.
Addressing Industry scenarios with technology: Demonstrated effectiveness in landing technology scenarios in industry-relevant ways and credibility to lead and influence niche industry conversations.
Competitive Landscape: Firm understanding of Microsoft’s Data platform technologies relative to major competitors

Partner Knowledge: Strong understanding of the partner ecosystem and the ability to leverage partner solutions to solve customer needs
Education

Bachelor’s degree in Computer Science or a similar information technology-related discipline, or in Business Administration (required)
Master’s degree (preferred)Certification in sales, sales management, complex sales training, sales methodologies, broad evangelism through events (presentation skills), and consultative selling (preferred)Additional training or education in Enterprise Architecture (preferred)
Microsoft is an equal opportunity employer. All qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to age, ancestry, color, family or medical care leave, gender identity or expression, genetic information, marital status, medical condition, national origin, physical or mental disability, political affiliation, protected veteran status, race, religion, sex (including pregnancy), sexual orientation, or any other characteristic protected by applicable laws, regulations and ordinances. If you need assistance and/or a reasonable accommodation due to a disability during the application or the recruiting process, please send a request via the Accommodation request form.
Benefits/perks listed below may vary depending on the nature of your employment with Microsoft and the country where you work.

skills: machine, learning, marketing, excel, accounting, python, sql, r
job_desc:
About Apeiron Insight
Apeiron Insight is a data-driven research & analytics company, providing insights & data products to investment companies for them to make better informed (investment) decisions. The amount of data is growing exponentially and it is becoming more difficult to distinguish signal from the noise. We deliver actionable intelligence by leveraging the power of predictive modelling & Machine Learning. Apeiron Insight is growing fast and we are hiring for a number of roles in multiple disciplines.
Your role at Apeiron Insight
We are looking for an Data Research Analyst to assist in leading a data-driven research approach to covering companies the telecoms sectors. You will be responsible for generating and publishing investment research. The responsibilities for this role include using proprietary data sets to build financial and statistical models, perform data analysis, write reports, update marketing materials, and service client requests.
The individual should be proficient with Excel, mathematical modeling, and have a basic understanding of financial statements and accounting. Experience with Python, SQL, or R is highly preferred. The individual should also be an effective written and verbal communicator. Additionally, the candidate must be self-motivated, detail-oriented, and a creative thinker who has interest & curiosity in the intersection of “alternative data,” investment research, and financial markets.
Responsibilities
Development and deployment of predictive models for estimation and prediction of corporate performance across the telecommunation sector.
Identify and execute creative ways to answer key industry questions using our proprietary data and insights.
Gather and analyze data from a variety of internal and external resources, including, but not limited to: proprietary datasets; company documents and materials; SEC/regulatory filings such as annual reports and 10Ks; industry publications; and online data services.
Write, edit, and publish equity research reports incorporating insights derived from financial and statistical models.
Vet new and unique data sets for relevancy to continually improve and broaden our scope and accuracy.
Perform ad hoc analyses in response to client requests.
Support the sales process by developing analyses for sales pitches and press releases.
What are we looking for?
Functional understanding of data analysis using Python, SQL or R is a must.
Ability to identify and work with strategic data partners.
Responsible for forecasting KPIs and identifying key business/industry trends based on use of alternative data.
Experience working with and analyzing large data sets and in developing actionable intelligence from the data.
Self-starter who works well in a fast-paced environment.
Team player, happy to work in closed proximity with the Data Engineering & the Management team.
You are currently living in the Netherlands and are able to fluently communicate in English (verbally and in writing). Command of the Dutch language is a plus.
Enjoy working in a cool & stylish office, overlooking the Hague, with excellent facilities.
We also really appreciate:
Strong mathematical and statistical background.
An intuitive understanding of business problems.
What to expect?
We believe in commitment: your permanent contract will be waiting for you.
Highly competitive salary tailored to your qualities & experience.
Bonus scheme.
8% holiday payment.
25 vacation days based on a 40 hour working week.
Personal education/study budget.
An informal working environment with innovative colleagues who strive for the very best.
Based in Rijswijk, of course in “hybrid mode”, working from home and office as best fits the nature of the work.
If you think this position fits you well, we sincerely hope to hear from you. If so, please submit your resume and motivation letter.

Heb je technisch inzicht en ben je klantgericht? Vind jij het leuk om in een gevarieerde omgeving te werken met teams van over de hele wereld? Kom dan werken bij ons Sofy team!

Hoe kun je complexe processen automatiseren?
Hoe analyseer en visualiseer je complexe datasets?
Hoe kun je met technische oplossingen inspelen complexe datasets?

Dit neem jij mee
Universitaire Master, bij voorkeur in een technische richting. Kennis van één of meerdere van de volgende onderwerpen is een pré:
o Web technologiën (HTML5, JavaScript, CSS, NodeJS, AngularJS, VueJS)

Je bent een teamplayer, maar zelfstandig te werk gaan is voor jou geen probleem. Dit uit zich door nevenactiviteiten, internationale ervaring of een relevante bijbaan
Je hebt interesse in de wereld om je heen en je bent maatschappelijk betrokken.

Wat ga jij doen alsWerkstudent Data & Analytics Sofy?
KPMG Sofy is een cloud-based Data & Analytics platform wat in 2015 intern ontwikkeld is binnen KPMG als een start-up. Op dit platform combineren we verschillende technologieën met KPMG kennis en klant data om daarmee klanten slimme oplossingen te bieden door de inzet van data analytics en workflows. Sofy is binnen KPMG Nederland ontwikkeld, maar heeft door de jaren heen enorm veel erkenning gekregen vanuit KPMG Global. Dit betekent dat niet alleen onze klanten zowel in Nederland als in het buitenland zitten, maar ook veel contact hebben met onze mede KPMG collega’s in het buitenland.
Je werkzaamheden bij dit snelgroeiende Sofy team zullen voornamelijk bestaan uit het ondersteunen van het team bij het uitvoeren van data analyses, implementaties,het ontwikkelen van nieuwe platform functionaliteiten voor het low-code Sofy platform en analyseer en interpreteer jij data waarvan je rapportages maakt zodat je intern en extern advies kunt geven.

Job Title
Data Designer
Job Description
In this role, you have the opportunity to
Unleash the power of design, data and AI to deliver value to people when it matters most: caring for their health. Work in a highly talented team, shape the data and AI design capability, work on exciting challenges in healthcare domain.
You will bring the Data Design competence to the next level by leveraging data as design material in the creative process and impact people’s health through meaningful data and AI enabled propositions. With your hands-on design and programming skills, you bring in a new view on and build exciting new propositions for our users and customers through visualizing and synthesizing on data. We are looking for a Data Design expert that can run projects in the team with high level of independence. This role can be for a computer or data scientist with clear experience in a creative, design environment, able to provide portfolio proving affinity with the design field. On the other hand, this role can be for a UX designer with clear affinity with data, who is able to work hands on with data and program oneself.
You are responsible for
Building differentiating propositions encompassing data and AI that are relevant to our end users in the healthcare domain
Gather, structure, visualize to translate data into insights
Support other designers in embedding data and AI into their design practice
Bridge the design capabilities with data science/AI capabilities
Building a toolset and repeatable way of working for data enabled design
You are a part of
The Data Enabled Design team, a group of data designers with expertise on data visualization, user experience research and prototyping with/around data and AI. The Data Enabled Design team is part of global 400+ design community and working on both business and research driven projects.
To succeed in this role, you should have the following skills and experience
University degree (WO/HBO) in Design or Computer Science (or related)
Hands on programming skills (e.g. React, NodeJS, D3)
Experience in creating strong design concepts
Knowledge and experience in the field of Artificial Intelligence is a pre
Independently act in both innovation projects as business projects
English verbal and writing
In return, we offer you
A path towards your most rewarding career. Succeeding in this role in a complex environment will open many doors for your long term career, in other areas in Philips or otherwise. We also believe that we are at our best as a company when you are at yours as a person. Thus, we offer competitive health benefits, a flexible work schedule and access to local well-being focused activities.
Why should you join Philips?
Working at Philips is more than a job. It’s a calling to create a healthier society through meaningful work, focused on improving 2.5 billion lives a year by delivering innovative solutions across the health continuum. Our people experience a variety of unexpected moments when their lives and careers come together in meaningful ways. Learn more by watching this video.
To find out more about what it’s like working for Philips at a personal level, visit the Working at Philips page on our career website, where you can read stories from our employee blog. Once there,you can also learn about our recruitment process, or find answers to some of the frequently asked questions.

job_desc:
Eindhoven
Do you enjoy building in-depth understanding of our business processes by deep-diving into data, and turning this information and insights and creating applications with business stakeholders? Then you are the Data Analyst we are looking for.
| Your challenges?

The mission of the data analyst is to draw fact-based conclusions based on available data. You will create reports and small applications for this. As a Data Analyst you will also participate in improvement programs.

As a Data Analyst you take responsibility to:

Create in-depth understanding of the business problems the stakeholders face;
Perform exploratory data analysis to identify trends and patterns to clarify and detail our understanding of the issues.
Find and combine (structured and unstructured) data
Clean and prepare data for processing, statistical analysis and (predictive) modelling
Transform data into information and insights
Directly manage stakeholders of your analysis by involving them on developments in your work
Take ownership over your team’s work to together create a successful end product
challenge business assumptions using fact-based analyses on business process data| What do we expect from you?

To succeed in this role, you should have the following skills and experience:

Excellent analytical skills including statistics on BSc. Level
Between the 3-6 years of experience in data analytics/ Business Intelligence, databases and related techniques
Knowledge of data cleaning, modelling, and transformation.
Good knowledge of data analytics methods and tools (like datamining, machine learning, predictive modelling, SQL, R, Phyton, Matlab, Tableau, etc.) and affinity with IT systems/applications.
Experience with applications like Spotfire, Mendix, SAP HANA, Excel, SQL and Python;
Good communications skills, verbally and in writing in both Dutch and English
Pro- active, enthusiastic and critical towards representativeness and accuracy of results.| What does our Business Cell have to offer?

We have a highly specialized and varied team. This provides a lot of expertise and knowledge that you can learn a lot from.

With our strong network and your personal ambition, we will ensure a wonderful career together.

| What can you expect from TMC?

TMC is an international high-tech consultancy company that brings expertise to their clients in order to support them with the realization of their technological challenges. As such, TMC is operating as an expert center at the disposition of its clients and we help them to be more competitive in an ever more global and faster changing technological world.

At TMC we believe that people are the driving force behind technological innovation. That is why we want to create the best possible conditions for tech talents to thrive in. We offer you a challenging and stimulating work environment in which you can be the director of your own career.
As an Employeneur you are part of our TMC family. Next to our outstanding technical expertise, fun and engagement are meaningful parts of our culture.
| Why choose for Employeneurship?

We are truly unique thanks to our Employeneurship model which is a true innovation for the High Technology consulting business. It is the business relationship of the 21th century for high skilled technical professionals. It is built around 5 main pillars:

You will have a permanent employment contract, offering you stability and security
You will get to know your market value and have a share in the profit your work generates thanks to the individual profit sharing
We will support you with a one-on-one coaching and trainings designed to help you develop your entrepreneurial skills
The competence cells structure, provides you with a strong meaningful and relevant network
The entrepreneurial lab: a playground for new ideas and a potential launching for start-ups
TMC is an equal opportunity employer and values diversity. We do not discriminate on the basis of race, religion, color, national origin, gender, sexual orientation, age, marital status, veteran status, or disability status.Is TMC a perfect fit for you?
Feel Free to Contact
Marnix Bosch
Business Manager Data Science, Netherlands
Tel: +31 (0)6 15 57 86 19

Freshheads zoekt een data analist! Word jij warm van cijfers en digitale innovatie? En weet jij met de juiste technische snufjes gouden groeikansen te spotten in een grote berg data? Dan word jij vast blij van deze functie!Wat ga jij doen?Steek die handen maar uit de mouwen, want als data analist bij Freshheads heb je een uiteenlopende functie waarbij je niet alleen bezig bent met data analyse, maar ook betrokken bent bij andere stappen binnen innovatie- en groeiprojecten. Samen met collega’s start je met het ontdekken van de groeikansen voor de producten, website, app of campagne van een klant. Wanneer jullie samen een geschikte strategie hebben bepaald richt jij je op het implementeren van de juiste data analysetools. Dankzij jouw kennis over programmeertalen zorg jij ervoor dat jullie geen data mislopen.Jouw liefde voor cijfers komt optimaal tot uiting wanneer je de data gaat analyseren. Jij ziet meteen waar kansen en pijnpunten liggen. Aan de hand van een visualisatie van de data in een dashboard leg je aan je team en de klant uit waar ze staan ten opzichte van hun doelen. Daarbij kom je met concrete voorbeelden, bedenk je relevante acties en/of kom je proactief met verbetervoorstellen.Bij Freshheads zijn acht teams iedere dag bezig met het realiseren van relevante digitale producten en diensten. Op dit moment zijn we op zoek naar een data analist die alle teams gaat helpen bij datavraagstukken van diverse klanten.Met wie ga je dit doen?Als nieuwe data analist sta je er natuurlijk niet alleen voor. Jij wordt de compagnon van data analist Nienke! Naast tennis en Nick & Simon is Nienke dol op cijfers, al helemaal op oplopende cijfers. Bijna 4 jaar geleden begon ze dan ook als eerste data analist bij Freshheads. Daardoor kan ze jou alle fijne kneepjes van het vak aanleren. Ze heeft de functie tenslotte zelf vorm mogen geven. Ook jouw input is daarin welkom. Samen verdelen jullie het werk voor onze klanten en helpen jullie elkaar waar nodig.ConcreetHerken jij jezelf in onderstaande punten? En nog belangrijker: word je er blij van?Je kent het volledige proces van data analyse.Het implementeren van analysetools (zoals Google Analytics/Data Studio, Firebase en Hotjar) is appeltje-eitje voor jou. Ook weet jij alles van Tag Management systemen.Pre: je hebt affiniteit met technische aspecten van digitale applicaties.Zo kun je goed uit de voeten met SQL. En R of Python zijn mooi meegenomen (maar geen must).Helder communiceren en adviseren gaat je goed af. Je weet inzichten uit data op de juiste manier te verwoorden en klanten en collega’s te overtuigen van jouw bevindingen.Flexibiliteit is een must have. Je kunt snel schakelen tussen verschillende projecten en werkt gemakkelijk samen met verschillende teams. Ondertussen raak jij het overzicht niet kwijt.Na je opleiding heb je minimaal 1 jaar werkervaring opgedaan op het gebied van data analyse en je hebt zin om hier nog meer over te leren.Je toont graag initiatief: wanneer jij het idee hebt dat collega’s een doel op een andere manier efficiënter kunnen bereiken, deel je jouw tips met hen.Freshheads biedt: Een functie in schaal C. Vraag hiervoor naar ons functiehuis.Een bruto maand salaris tussen € 2000,- en € 4000,-, afhankelijk van jouw ervaring.Een reiskostenvergoeding op basis van de gereden kilometers of een OV kaart tot je beschikking.25 vakantiedagen per jaar (op basis van een 40-urige werkweek) en 8% vakantiegeld.Pensioenopbouw waarbij Freshheads 60% van de premie betaalt en jij de overige 40% via je salaris.Werkplek: zowel thuis als op kantoor. Jij en jouw team bepalen zelf wat werkt.Een thuiswerkvergoeding van €40,- per maand. Want die koffie betaalt zichzelf niet.Voldoende persoonlijk budget voor opleidingen en het inrichten van je thuiswerkplek.Fresh-Health dagen. Naast jouw vakantiedagen krijg je 5 Fresh-Health dagen per jaar, in te zetten om meer rust te nemen en een goede werk-privé balans te behouden.Een teambudget. Jaarlijks krijgen jullie €200,- per persoon om als team uit te geven, bijvoorbeeld aan een etentje, avondje borrelen of bowlen of aan thee van Simon Lévelt. We noemen maar een dwarsstraat.Tijd voor eigen ontwikkeling. Heel belangrijk, want als jij groeit, groeit Freshheads ook. We hebben zes coaches die jou helpen persoonlijke leerdoelen te formuleren en bereiken.Onvergetelijke vrijdagmiddagborrels, met eens in de maand een legendarische XL-variant.Een kantoor waar je wel zou willen wonen, op loopafstand van het Tilburgse station.Samen sporten. Zo doen we mee aan het zaalvoetbaltoernooi voor bedrijven, organiseren we ons eigen Freshheads Tennistoernooi en gaan we wekelijks met een clubje boulderen.Over FreshheadsFreshheads is een digital service agency. Dat betekent dat we digitale diensten ontwikkelen die organisaties verder vooruit helpen. Samen met onze klanten ontdekken we kansen voor digitale diensten, ontwerpen en ontwikkelen we die diensten, én laten we ze groeien. We vinden het belangrijk dat zo’n dienst daadwerkelijk (met plezier!) wordt gebruikt, dat het bijdraagt aan de doelen van een organisatie, en dat het iets toevoegt aan de maatschappij.Soort dienstverband: FulltimeSalaris: €2.000,00 - €4.000,00 per maand

Marketing
Rietbaan 48 Capelle aan den IJssel
Marketing / E-Commerce
HBO (Bachelor), Universiteit (Master)
Minimaal 2 jaar relevante werkervaring
80%
Vast (BT/OT)
Hier kom je terecht

Samen bereiken we meer, daarom werken we in dynamische teams vol uitdagingen. Binnen Hallmark maak je deel uit van het Digital team waar jij het team zal versterken dat bestaat uit 30 gepassioneerde professionals. Samen met jouw team heb jij de missie om mensen in het hart te raken met onze producten, de gebruikerservaring continue te verbeteren en de commerciële doelstellingen te behalen. De afdeling werkt op basis van SCRUM methodiek samen.

Zo ziet jouw rol eruit

In deze functie heb jij als doel om alle data binnen de afdeling Digital te verzamelen, consolideren, analyseren en interpreteren.

Is jouw persoonlijkheid en aanpak een goede match met onderstaande taken en verantwoordelijkheden die je als Data Analist vervult?

Beheren van Google Analytics 360, Tag Manager, conversietracking, en rapportagetools (met name PowerBI);
Sparringpartner van de afdeling Marketing & Digital voor opzetten en benutten van analyses o.a. via PowerBI rapportage;
Sparringpartner voor Squad Lead Digital en online marketeers voor media-, performance- en klantsegmentatiebeslissingen;
Vormen en voeren van de strategie m.b.t. de incrementele data volwassenheid ten behoeve van de gehele afdeling;
Owner van de data verzameling, datalayer en tools t.b.v. de consolidatie van die data in een 360 graden klantbeeld;
Consolideren van online data ter voeding van ons data warehouse (SQL & PowerBI);
Verantwoordelijk voor de technische automatisering van bovenstaande, voor zover kundig.

De standplaats van deze functie is Capelle aan den IJssel en je rapporteert aan de Head of Digital.

Zijn we een match?

Nieuwsgierig, pragmatisch, autodidact en analytisch. Dit zijn kwaliteiten die jou omschrijven en je graag inzet tijdens je dagelijkse werkzaamheden.

Check, check, dubbelcheck

Zie jij jezelf al schitteren binnen Hallmark? De formaliteiten zijn ook van belang, dus check nog even of je voldoet aan onderstaande eisen:

Een HBO/WO opleiding bij voorkeur in de richting van Data, Economie en/of Marketing;
Ervaring met het analyseren van data en het adviseren van de business d.m.v. visualisatietools;
Aanvullende ervaring in Online Marketing, Google Analytics, Power BI, SQL, R;
Analytisch en aantoonbaar ervaring met een trackrecord ten aanzien van grotere en geautomatiseerde dataoplossingen en datalayer implementatie en onderhoud;
Relevante kennis van Data management Solutions (DMP’s / Data Warehousing) en Java scripting (GTM) zou mooi meegenomen zijn;
Technische kennis van (Google) advertising platformen en conversietracking;
Uitstekende beheersing van de Nederlands en Engelse taal in woord en geschrift.
Wat bieden wij
Marktconform salaris
Vakantiegeld (8% in de maand mei)
Reiskostenvergoeding
Thuiswerkmogelijkheden: vergoeding/dag & thuiswerkvoorzieningen
Eindejaarsuitkering (300 euro bruto op basis van fulltime in de maand december)
Bonusregeling afhankelijk van de winst
Personeelskorting
Ben jij er klaar voor om als Data Analist aan de slag te gaan

Herken jij jezelf volledig in bovenstaand profiel en maak je graag onderdeel uit van het Digital team? Dan nodigen wij je uit om te solliciteren met je CV en motivatiebrief via de 'Solliciteren'-knop

Acquisitie naar aanleiding van deze vacature wordt niet op prijs gesteld.

Sollicitatieprocedure
Wij sturen je een digitale ontvangstbevestiging van jouw ingediende sollicitatie.
Wij bekijken jouw documenten en beoordelen in overleg of er sprake van een match is. Het kan ook zo zijn dat we een andere vacature hebben waar je beter bij past.
In een telefonisch gesprek maken we kennis met elkaar en is er gelegenheid om vragen te stellen voor beide partijen.
Wanneer het klikt, plannen we een eerste interview in. Digitaal of bij ons op kantoor.
In totaal hebben we maximaal 3 gesprekken, mogelijk een assessment en/of een referentie check voordat we overgaan tot een arbeidsvoorwaardelijk voorstel.
Ben jij onze nieuwe collega? Welkom bij Hallmark!

Extra voordelen

Een bijzonder hartelijk welkom waarbij je de tijd krijgt om iedereen te leren kennen.

DSM – Bright Science. Brighter Living.™
Royal DSM is a global, purpose-led, science-based company active in Nutrition, Health and Sustainable Living. DSM’s purpose is to create brighter lives for all. DSM addresses with its products and solutions some of the world’s biggest challenges while simultaneously creating economic, environmental and societal value for all its stakeholders – customers, employees, shareholders, and society at large. DSM delivers innovative solutions for human nutrition, animal nutrition, personal care and aroma, medical devices, green products and applications, and new mobility and connectivity. DSM and its associated companies deliver annual net sales of about €10 billion with approximately 23,000 employees. The company was founded in 1902 and is listed on Euronext Amsterdam.
More information can be found at www.dsm.com.DSM Food & Beverages is a leading global supplier of food enzymes, cultures, and taste and bio-preservation ingredients. At DSM we want to help make existing diets healthier and more sustainable. We are driven to help create foods that people around the world can truly enjoy without compromises.For our Supply Chain department we are looking for a Data Quality Analyst who will be responsible for analyzing the master data quality and for making sure data is being improved by the business. You will use existing and develop new Power BI Dashboards in order to get more insights. You will work closely with various stakeholders within business, e.g. within Supply Chain, Finance and Sales. By collecting their data requirements and reverting back your findings, you are able to successfully improve the master data quality within DSM Food & Beverages.Key-responsibilities
You are responsible for analyzing the quality of the master data within DSM Food & Beverages.
You act as a business partner where you engage the business to improve the master data quality.
Use existing Power BI reports to address data quality and performance issues to the business. Present your results and design action plans together with the stakeholders in order to solve the issues.
Develop and integrate new KPI’s into existing Power BI reports
Develop and roll-out new Power BI Dashboards
Increase engagement of usage Power BI Dashboards
Key contact person within the CDM team regarding reporting questions
The scope of the data sources is focused on various SAP systems, mostly concentrating on Material and/or Customer Master Data.We Bring
You get the opportunity to be of great added value to our business, customers, employees and overall DSM.
You get the possibility to be the go to person for master data quality within DSM Food & Beverages.
A dynamic work environment with many challenges that give you the possibility to work autonomously and with a team in finding the right solutions. You are giving the freedom to be creative and proactive.
An inclusive and multicultural team with respect for everyone.
We offer you the possibility to grow and develop yourself professionally and personally.
A good Collective Labor Agreement and competitive salary.
Besides 25 paid holidays plus budget to buy additionally up to 13 extra holidays.
A membership for only 15 Euros per month at a newly equipped gym on site.You Bring
Either a Bachelor degree with several years of relevant experience or a Master degree in business administration, Data Science or related.
A high level of understanding or experience with creating reports in Power BI, this is a must!
You are fluent in English (written and verbal).
Excellent analytical and communication skills, this is a position where you are expected to proactively connect with the business
Experience with SAP; high level of understanding of master data structures in SAP (objects, tables, etc.).
High level of understanding of MS Excel and MS Access
Experience with working in an international or multi-cultural business environmentHow to apply?
Interested in this position? Please apply on-line by sending us your CV & motivation letter in English. Due to data privacy reasons we do not handle any applications sent by email. Please be so kind to use the link provided. For additional questions you can contact, Clémentine Rolaff-van de Panne / Recruitment Business Partner (Clementine.panne-van-de@dsm.com).Reference check procedures and an assessment can be part of the DSM Recruitment & Selection Process. You will be informed when these procedures are required.
Royal DSM is an equal employment opportunity and affirmative action employer and all qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to race, color, religion, sex, national origin, age, protected veteran status, status as a qualified individual with a disability, or any other characteristic protected by law.
Royal DSM and its associated companies deliver annual net sales of about €10 billion with approximately 23,000 employees. The company is listed on Euronext. For more information about DSM see http://www.dsm.com or connect on
At DSM, we believe that a brighter future is built on diversity. We’re proud to offer equal employment opportunities and to be an affirmative action employer. That means that we consider applications based on how well suited you are for the role – regardless of race, color, religion, sexual orientation, gender identity, national origin, age, protected veteran status or disability.

job_title: Developer Advocate - Data Science and ML Engineering
job_desc:
This is Adyen

Adyen is the payments platform of choice for the world's leading companies, delivering frictionless payments across online, mobile, and in-store channels. Our team members are motivated individuals that help each other do remarkable things every day. We face unique technical challenges at scale and we solve those as a team. And together, we deliver innovative and ethical solutions that transform the way the world pays.

We took an unobvious approach to starting a payments company, building a platform from scratch. Now, Adyen serves the world's brightest companies like Facebook, Uber, L'Oreal, Casper, Bonobos, and Spotify.

Our engineers are reshaping the payments landscape. We're looking for more talented problem solvers to help us address a unique set of challenges.

As Adyen is growing, one of the ways for us to improve the experience of our merchants is to improve our use of data, for example for fraud detection or conversion optimization. That is why we are looking for a passionate coder, writer, and communicator to help drive our data science and engineering experience at Adyen as well as helping us show the external world our advancements and achievements around data and machine learning.

You will be part of our advocacy team, based in Amsterdam and report to Engineering. Here, you will get familiar with and work on the payment industry's most advanced and robust platform.

What you'll do
Extend bridges from Adyen to the world data community by scouting, keeping tuned and participating or enabling the participation of the Adyen data people in industry developments, conferences, podcasts and popular sites and communities.
Develop, strengthen and grow relationships with partners and universities.
Build example algorithms, pipeline examples and notebooks to help partners and engineers use and understand Adyen's data products and features.
Help empower the internal community by organizing internal lectures and alignment sessions, even inviting external guest speakers and curating a newsletter with internal developments and public articles on relevant developments to the Adyen data community.
Work together with the Tech Academy team in recognizing new learning areas and crafting training sessions and courses.
Identify open source opportunities and ideas that we would like to explore and possibly adopt and contribute to.
Own the on-boarding process for new data and machine learning scientists, engineers and analysts.
Contribute to our technical documentation and tech blog.
Be the voice of the data and machine learning scientists and engineers, gathering feedback and sharing it with internal stakeholders
Work with a global team, including international travel to visit our different offices or participate and run events
Who you are
You have technical experience in data science and machine learning algorithms and methodologies.
You are experienced in one or more machine learning, data science and big data frameworks and tools (Airflow, TensorFlow, Spark).
You have a good graph of the data science ecosystem, events, conferences, support channels, tech personalities and trends.
You have experience with technical writing and/or blogging on development topics.
You are passionate about new technologies and open source.
You love working with people and making their day happier.
These are not required but would be a plus:
Background in event production, including hosting, organizing and participating in developer community events
Knowledge in payments or fintech
Contribution to opensource projects
Please, note that this role is a full-time position in Amsterdam. It will require a relocation in case you live outside of the Netherlands.

Our Diversity, Equity and Inclusion commitments

Our unobvious approach is a product of our diverse perspectives. This diversity of backgrounds, cultures, and perspectives is essential in helping us maintain our momentum. Our business and technical challenges are unique, we need as many different voices as possible to join us in solving them - voices like yours. So no matter where you're from, who you love, or what you believe in, we welcome you to be your true self at Adyen.

Studies show that women and members of underrepresented communities apply for jobs only if they meet 100% of the qualifications. Even if you don't meet 100% of the criteria then Adyen encourages you to reconsider and apply. We look forward to your application.

DATA SCIENCE CONSULTANT AMSTERDAM

skills: ai, r, sql, nosql, python, tableau, machine, learning
job_desc:
We are looking for an experienced Principal Data Scientist to join our Data Science & Business Analytics team. The ideal candidate should have 7+ years of consulting experience or relevant industry experience, with at least 3+ years at a project lead level.
What we offer
Interact with our clients on regular basis to drive their business towards impactful change
Lead your team in creating new business solutions via data-driven insights
Seize opportunities at the client and at Metyis in our entrepreneurial environment
Become part of a fast-growing international and diverse team
What you will do

Metyis is growing! We are looking for an experienced Principal Data Scientist to join our Data Science & Business Analytics team. As a Principal you:

Are responsible for managing client interactions and play a key role in building and maintaining client relationships
Translate business problems to analytics solutions with clear output. Translate analytical output to drive business decisions that create impact
Provide project management oversight required to meet client expectations
Responsibilities may include overall project delivery quality, development of presentations, and managing of external relationships
Function as a sounding board for data and analytics related questions of client business leadership
Seek compelling opportunities beyond the scope of the current project
Provide guidance to more junior members of the team, while orchestrating the work of the entire team. Drive growth and development for the members of the team
What you’ll bring
Master (or Ph.D.) degree in a quantitative field with focus on data analysis (e.g. econometrics, AI, mathematics, statistics, physics, and other exact sciences)
Mastery of problem-solving and solutioning R
Robust knowledge of statistical concepts, accompanied by expertise with a set of analytical tools ranging from databases (e.g. SQL, BigQuery, noSQL) to programming languages (e.g. R, Python), and from data visualization (e.g. Tableau, PowerBI) to machine learning. Understanding data engineering solutions is a plus.
Proven ability to own the full responsibility of overall delivery, manage projects with expert team members, and provide inspiring guidance to the team
7+ years of consulting experience or relevant industry experience, with at least 3+ years at a project lead level
Excellent communication skills, especially to explain complex analytical concepts in non-technical terms to business users.
Professional fluency in Dutch and English
